fundamentals.logs.console_logger(level='INFO')[source]¶

Setup and return a console logger only.

Key Arguments:
  • level – the level of logging required
Return:
  • logger – the console logger

fundamentals.times.calculate_time_difference(startDate, endDate)[source]¶

Return the time difference between two dates

Key Arguments:
  • startDate – the first date in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format
  • endDate – the final date YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format
Return:
  • diffDate – the difference between the two dates in Y,M,D,h,m,s (string)
fundamentals.times.get_now_sql_datetime()[source]¶

A datetime stamp in MySQL format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS

Return:
  • now – current time and date in MySQL format
